column5: Greetings to all of our friends north of the border for a Happy Thanksgiving! Hope all enjoy a pleasant long weekend with family, friends, and neighbors. I'll join you by being thankful for the opportunities I've had to enjoy your wondrous forests and lakes, your warm hospitality, and the "eh" speaking friends I've made over the years.
Thank you, Jay.This is always a big family weekend.Frank
Thanks Jay.....it's a beautiful day for a turkey, or maybe even a musky!
Thanks Jay for the kind words,... we do have a lot to be thankful for up here in the great white north, . i'm proud to say that i live in the best country on the planet. Mike
Best wishes to our friends north of the border for a Happy Thanksgiving !Faith, Family, Friends.....and Fishing,Rich B

I'm heading out for 2 or 3 hours of fishing, then return to camp and enjoy Thanksgiving dinner with the Geary family, a few of their friends and three moose hunters. This will be my 4th Thanksgiving at Sportsman's Lodge on Little Vermilion Lake. I'm so very fortunate to have this opportunity. It makes my life better. And perhaps a little longer.
Your in a good place in good hands Enjoy your stay!
